name: anova_test_from_database
description: Perform a one-way ANOVA test using data from an SQLite database.

database_path.description: Path to the SQLite database file.

from_clause.description: SQL FROM clause (table name or JOIN statement).

category_col.description: Categorical column used for grouping. Even if this is an int column, it will be cast to string.

value_col.description: Numeric column to test across groups.

where_clause.description: Optional SQL WHERE clause (without the 'WHERE' keyword).

where_params.description: Optional parameters for the WHERE clause.

show_summary_stats.description: Whether to include count, mean, and std for each group.

show_interpretation.description: Whether to include a human-readable interpretation of the result.

drop_empty_groups.description: If true, drop empty groups. Otherwise, raise an error when any group is empty.
